text: Yakhana manusake duhkha-kasta sparsa kare, takhana se ekagracitte tara palanakartake dake, atahpara tini yakhana take neyamata dana karena, takhana se kastera katha bismrta haye yaya, yara jan'ye purbe dekechila ebam allahara samakaksa sthira kare; yate kare aparake allahara patha theke bibhranta kare. Baluna, tumi tomara kuphara sahakare kichukala jibanopabhoga kare na'o. Niscaya tumi jahannamidera antarbhukta.
